promotions.plp_message: Save 15% in cart with code AMERICA
promotions.pdp_message: Save 15% in cart with code AMERICA
promotions.legal_disclaimer_text: Offer available online only. Save 15% on select furniture, rugs and wall decor. Enter promo code AMERICA at checkout to receive discount. Not valid on previous orders. Offer excludes items sold & shipped by Target Plus™ Partners and clearance items. Discount not applicable to gift wrap, tax, or shipping and handling charges. Pricing, promotions and availability may vary by location and on Target.com. Offer expires Thursday 7/4/2019 at 11:59pm PT.
Save 5% on subscription orders. Discount applied in cart at checkout. Discount not applicable to gift wrap, tax, or shipping and handling charges. May not be applied to previous orders.
